overview: Navin and Pia, a young live-in couple, have chosen to live an alternate life in Goa, away from the hustle and bustle of big city life. Pia exepcts Navien to step up from his sedintry life style and join Dancing classes with her. Will Navien be able to take resposibilty towards his relationship and accept the change expected from him. As they both through Denial, anger, seek compromise, feel desperate, will they be able to find acceptance and maintain a healthy equal partnership?
title: Mango Jam
